resources.string: Do you really want to quit the App?

..::Requirements::..
 
 1. Minimum of 2, maximum of 20 players
 2. Various types of alcohol / Different types of spirits
 3. Non-alcohlic drinks
 4. A glass
 
 ..::Gameplay::..
 
 Taking turns, each player must click on the cards. The first player to pickup a jack, has to pour alcohol into the glass. The player who picks up the second jack has to pour some of the non-alcoholic drink into the glass. The player who picks up the third jack has to taste the mix. The player who picks up the last jack has to chug the drink! 

 Enjoy!
